VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Health Sciences?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Health Sciences is arc {Arts}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Business?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Business is arc {Arts}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Social Sciences} has the largest input flow.

EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Health Sciences and Social Sciences is {262}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Health Sciences?
SC.A: The total flow output from Health Sciences is {354}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Business?
SC.A: The total flow input by Business is {560}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 304? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {326} from {Business} to {Social Sciences}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 106? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {92} from {Health Sciences} to {Business}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 161 and 230? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {212} from {Business} to {Arts}, a flow of {185} from {Arts} to {Business}, a flow of {177} from {Arts} to {Social Sciences}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Health Sciences to Social Sciences or from Business to Health Sciences?
NC.A: The flow from {Health Sciences} to {Social Sciences} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Health Sciences to Business, from Social Sciences to Health Sciences, or from Social Sciences to Business?
NC.A: The flow from {Social Sciences} to {Business} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Business}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Business} and {Social Sciences}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Arts, Arc Business, Arc Social Sciences, Arc Health Sciences}.
